segments.text: I was nervous at that time . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just fine . I tried to answer every question raised by HR carefully . I found some answering skills are useful . These questions are different from exams .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can have a rest now after this tough interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be rush . It is suggested to write a letter for the Personnel Department of Future Clothes Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like a good idea . And I think this can leave deep impression to HR . How can we write a suitable letter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just to show your gratitude to the chance and tell them your impression on the company . And you can mention some details in your own interview to remind them of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am getting to know your meaning .
segments.speaker: S2
